Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 3 from any)
Lifesense: Can imprecisely sense the life force of living and undead creatures within 10'
Spirit Soother: Can attempt to notice haunts without Searching, and gains +1 to disable them
Combat
Hit Points: 20 Armor Class: 17 (dexterity (3 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 15 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Bo Staff (+6 1d8+1 B; strength; expert); Sap (+6 1d6+1 B; strength; expert); Sawtooth Saber (+5 1d6+1 S; dexterity; trained); War Flail (+6 1d10+1 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Duskwalker Weapon Familiarity: Weapon Familiarity (Bo Staff; Longbow; Composite Longbow; Scythe; Staff)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Deliberate Death: (R) Makes a melee Strike against a foe that inflicts the dying condition on self once per day
Ghost Hunter: Strikes on incorporeal creatures are magical, and magical weapons gain ghost touch effects
Quietus Strikes: Attacks are magical and inflict +1 HP void or vitality, or +2 HP with a +3 potency rune
Reactive Shield: (R) Performs Raise A Shield to absorb damage from the triggering melee Strike
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Underwater Marauder: Does not suffer off-guard or penalties from using bludgeoning and slashing melee weapons in water
Save: Fortitude: +7 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +7 (dexterity; expert); Will: +5 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Chance Death: (R) Rerolls a fatally failed recovery check or save once per day
Duskwalker Heritage: Cannot become undead
Resist Ruin: Has resistance 5 to void
Ward Against Corruption: +1 vs. death effects, disease, undead, and sahkils, and +2 vs. undead and sahkil death effects and disease
Magic
Attack: Divine Innate: +5 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Divine Innate: 15 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Augury (D2): (10 min) Reveals whether the results of a proposed action up to 30 min in the future will be generally good or bad
False Vitality (D2): (2) Self gains 10 temporary HP for 8 hr (heightened +1 gives +3 HP)
Interplanar Teleport (D7): (10 min) Transports self and 8 willing targets to an imprecise location on a different plane
Peaceful Rest (D2): (2) Touched corpse does not decay and cannot be made undead until next daily prep (heightened 5th effects are permanent)
Magic Notes:
Boneyard's Call: Knows the Interplanar Teleport divine innate spell; can cast it twice per week to travel to and from the Boneyard
Duskwalker Magic: Knows the Augury and Peaceful Rest divine innate spells; can cast each at 2nd rank once per day
Resist Ruin: Knows the False Vitality divine innate spell; can cast it at 5th rank once per day
